testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Testimonials from students, parents, and teachers

student.name: Alemitu Tadesse
student.text: This platform has transformed my learning experience. The lessons are engaging and I love how I can learn at my own pace.

parent.name: Dawit Bekele
parent.text: As a parent, I appreciate being able to track my child's progress. The communication with teachers is seamless.

teacher.name: Tigist Haile
teacher.text: This platform allows me to create engaging content for my students and easily track their understanding of concepts.

cta.title: Ready to Start Learning?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of Ethiopian high school students already using our platform to improve their academic performance.

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: Our Ethiopian high school e-learning system provides comprehensive educational resources for students across Ethiopia. We aim to make quality education accessible to all students regardless of their location.
about.paragraph2: Our platform offers a wide range of courses aligned with the national curriculum, interactive learning materials, and tools for teachers to effectively manage their classes and track student progress.

section1.title: Information Collection and Use
section1.content: We collect information to provide better services to our users. The types of information we collect include account information, usage information, and other information provided by you or obtained with your consent.

section2.title: Data Security
section2.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

section3.title: Changes to This Policy
section3.content: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
